channel.title: How to remove the Banning Host option
channel.description: How do i remove the, BANNING HOST < ip example > flooding, Meaning I don't want it to ban hosts for flooding. How do I go about that? or even if i could make it make them stop logging in for a minute then they are able to again, anything like that. but i think removing it would be good. Its a 317 delta too ;D

item.title: How to remove the Banning Host option
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Oh, Then i dont continue talking. I’ve never worked with Delta
Good luck !

Read full topic
item.source: How to remove the Banning Host option

item.title: How to remove the Banning Host option
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“dagger9090, post:4, topic:517998”]when you flood the server you get ip’d but when the server restarts you are unbanned, i want to remove that.
example: If i log off and log on really quickly, it will say BANNING HOST < ip > flooding.
it bans the host for flooding i want to remove that, the right way, i tried already and got errors so thought i would find out the right way on here.

and if i dont HAVE to remove it great i would like it to just last like 2 minutes then let the person back on, but i feel removing it would be easier for some reason.[/quote]
for it to work for 2 minutes, you’d have to set up a timer.
To remove it completely, the first thing you should do is search “Banning Host” in client.java

@Shock
It’s delta, the banning host ‘file’ is actually in the client.java

Read full topic
item.source: How to remove the Banning Host option

item.title: How to remove the Banning Host option
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Then set the Server restarter so that it does not touch the banninghost file… Simple

Read full topic

item.title: How to remove the Banning Host option
item.dc:creator: @dagger9090 dagger9090
item.description:
@dagger9090 wrote:

when you flood the server you get ip’d but when the server restarts you are unbanned, i want to remove that.
example: If i log off and log on really quickly, it will say BANNING HOST < ip > flooding.
it bans the host for flooding i want to remove that, the right way, i tried already and got errors so thought i would find out the right way on here.

and if i dont HAVE to remove it great i would like it to just last like 2 minutes then let the person back on, but i feel removing it would be easier for some reason.

Read full topic
